name: Wands
description: The suit of Wands represents creativity, passion, and energy. It is associated with action, ambition, and making plans for the future.

name: Cups
description: The suit of Cups is related to emotions, relationships, and connections. It signifies love, intuition, and the depth of feelings.

name: Swords
description: The suit of Swords symbolizes intellect, thoughts, and communication. It deals with challenges, conflicts, and the power of the mind.

name: Pentacles
description: The suit of Pentacles represents material aspects, such as money, career, and possessions. It focuses on practicality, security, and the physical world.
